"Echo":
"Whew, finally it's over~...
It's so tiring being a Hunter as I've
thought."

"...erm, I'm not complaining about it but
just expressing my thoughts, ok?"

"Although you are still far away from
replacing Zeno, but I think it was the
right choice to request for you to take
the special training."

"...Yes, that's also what I'm thinking
right now. Alright, let's go back."

"ふぅ、終わったぁ～……
やっぱりハンターって疲れるわね。"

"……い、今のは別に弱音じゃなくて
率直な感想だからね。"

"ゼノの代わりになるにはまだまだだけど
きみに特訓をお願いしたのは
正解だったかな。"

"……うん。今のも率直な感想。
じゃ、帰還しよっか。"
